info.name: tldp.org LDP - Readable width (+beautify+fixd nav)
info.description:
Mainly a hack to make text more pleasant to read - restrict width.

Like style 47496 but with additional fixed navigation menu:
Navigation menu is always in reach in bottom of screen.

Screen-example from: http://www.tldp.org/LDP/intro-linux/html/sect_03_01.html

Tested on Firefox 4
